entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
